subject: Shippemnt
description_text:
Hi, i want to know more information on my order itens bem 1 week+ and wasnt
shipped yet could u send it as soon as possible thanks. Order #SSN5718

conversations.body_text: Hi PixeL,       Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We will arrange shipment within the next two days and sincerely apologize for the delay.

Hi, any updates? When will you can send the pedals?

service@simsonn.com

Hi PixeL,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
